Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Lakers to win based on their recent performance
Coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
The duel between Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo was highlighted as the key matchup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at the Footprint Center in Phoenix
The Suns' defense is now bottom 10 in the league
The Hawks face off against the Phoenix Suns and will be without one of their key contributors in Jalen Johnson
Others: Jalen Johnson is out with a shoulder injury
Trae Young is probable with an Achilles injury
Royce O'Neale is out with an ankle injury
The Hawks are 19-19 this season, while the Suns are 17-19
The Hawks are 7-10 in their road games against the spread
The totals have gone OVER in 6 of the Suns' 19 last games at home
The Suns are 13-23 in their last 5 games against the spread
The Hawks are 15-23 in their last 5 games against the spread
The Hawks are 25-13 in their last 5 games in terms of over/under
The Suns are 16-20 in their last 5 games in terms of over/under
